titles.title: Perpetual POW/MIA Stamp Act
Perpetual POW/MIA Stamp Act
To provide for the issuance of a forever stamp to honor the sacrifices of the brave men and women of the Armed Forces who are still prisoner, missing, or unaccounted for, and for other purposes.
Perpetual POW/MIA Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Perpetual POW/MIA Stamp Act
This bill directs the Postmaster General to provide for the issuance of a forever stamp that honors the sacrifices of the members of the U.S. Armed Forces who have been prisoners, missing, or unaccounted for and that depicts the National League of Families POW/MIA flag.
